ValidationRule.description: For advice leads, ensures that key fields are captured for MI purposes.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.DeveloperName = "General" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "Referral" ) && ISPICKVAL(Status , "No Further Action") && NOT(INCLUDES(Lost_Reasons__c, "Did not contact - old lead")) && (ISBLANK(Lost_Reasons__c) || ISBLANK(Lost_Notes__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify a lost reason and notes.
